paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider the residual lifetimes of surviving components of a failed coherent system with statistically independent and identically distributed components, given that before time t(1) (t(1) > 0) exactly r (r < n) components have failed, and at time t(2) (t(2) > t(1)) the system just failed. Some aging properties and preservation results of the residual lives of the surviving components of such systems are obtained. Also some examples and applications are given.
paper_title: The Residual Lifetime of Surviving Components From Failed Coherent Systems
